name: Be my eyes
description: Be My Eyes is a free mobile app that connects people who are blind or have low vision with sighted volunteers and company representatives around the world.

name: Karma
description: karma is a food app for buying surplus food, at half the usual price. karma highlights surplus food in your local area to buy, collect and enjoy

name: Transfer Galaxy
description: Transfer Galaxy are trying to make the world a little bit fairer. One step at a time. We are democratizing international payments by making remittances cheaper, safer and smarter.

name: Work ahead
description: We build software that organizations use for advancing human rights, decent work, and sustainable development especially in their international supply chains.
